name: Chemical Desaster
description:
Story

In a dystopic future you made yourself a paradise in an old shopping mall . You have to protect your home from acid rain, that sometimes appears because of environmental pollution. Neutralize the rain puddles with chemicals and objects that you can find!

While playing the game you can learn about PH levels of different fluids.

Protect your home as long as possible!

Learn Effect

Chemistry, Strategy, PH levels, Basic Maths

Controls

Movement: A - left, D - right, S - down, W - top (Alternative: Arrow keys)

Pick up: SPACE

Music volume: 1 - quiter, 2 - louder
